Html: There are various tools for the purpose but I recommend MBOX to PST Converter Tool from http://www.datarepairtools.com/mbox-to-pst-converter.html which is an excellent tool for the purpose and supports upto Windows 8 and MS Outlook 2013. Using MBOX to PST tool you can convert mbox file created in any of the mail client to MS Outlook PST or RTF, PDF, Office 365 & HTML formats.
